mule.flow: %dw 2.0 output application/xml --- { <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <config> <element ref="ns2:customer"/> </config> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ns0:inputBindings xmlns:ns0="http://xmlns.tibco.com/bw/process/2003"> <xsl:for-each xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" select="$JMS-Queue-Receiver/ns6:ActivityOutput/OtherProperties"> <ee:customer xmlns:ns1="http://xmlns.example.com/unique/default/namespace/1134438639123"> <ee:customerid> <xsl:value-of select="customerid"/> </ee:customerid> <ee:firstname> <xsl:value-of select="firstname"/> </ee:firstname> <ee:lastname> <xsl:value-of select="lastname"/> </ee:lastname> <ee:age> <xsl:value-of select="age"/> </ee:age> <ee:email> <xsl:value-of select="email"/> </ee:email> <ee:city> <xsl:value-of select="city"/> </ee:city> <ee:zipcode> <xsl:value-of select="zipcode"/> </ee:zipcode> <ee:transactionstatus> <xsl:value-of select="transactionstatus"/> </ee:transactionstatus> </ee:customer> </xsl:for-each> </ns0:inputBindings>}<http:request method="GET" doc:name="Request" config-ref="HTTP_Request_configuration" path=" WADL POST JSON No Authentication customerDetails http://localhost:8085/orderCreateAPI POST_CreateCustomer /orderCreateAPI/customerDetails /WADL/OrderService.wadl  "/>%dw 2.0 output application/xml --- { <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
